title: Bug 3666: Code Completion Hungry code assist
description:
Bug 3666: Code Completion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)

Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class. As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct. 

Steps:
1. Change the baz call to baz(x.x.foo())
2. Place the cursor after the first "x."
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist
4. Type "f" to filter the list
5. Select "foo()"
OB: When following the steps provided, code assist eats too much code.
EB: Code assist should only replace the foo() portion of the code, leaving the rest intact.
SR:
1. Change the baz call to baz(x.x.foo())
2. Place the cursor after the first "x."
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist
4. Type "f" to filter the list
5. Select "foo()"
